messages.text: Lufthansa Group Inspirational AI flight assistant. Nice to meet you!
Hello and welcome aboard the Lufthansa Group experience. I am Aris, your digital travel orchestrator. Tell mewhat kind of journey are you envisioning today?
Business trip to Zurich, next Friday. Need to be back on Monday.
Thank you for providing the details. To confirm, you would like to travel to Zurich for a business trip, departing next Friday and returning on Monday. Is this correct?
It seems there was an error because the departure date is in the past. Could you please provide a valid departure date starting from today?
It seems there was an error because the return date is before the departure date. Could you please provide a valid return date that is on or after the departure date?
Here are the flight options for your trip from Munich to Zurich:
Here are the flight options for your trip from Munich to Zurich:
Can we change the return date to 2025-10-28
Here are the updated flight options for your trip from Munich to Zurich:
Could you please confirm if Munich is the correct origin city for your trip? If not, please provide the correct one.
